title: Invincible one
author: Invincible one
content: EasyCoins is a Crypto Investment Platform for the masses making Crypto Investments Easy. comments.author: Alfredbolk
comments.body: EasyCoins seem good to me. But before I create my account I would like to know more about your project. Where you based on? Are you registered company?

comments.author: ADAM Alams
comments.body: How does 25% APY calculate? Is it fixed?

comments.author: Invincible one
comments.created_time: December 07, 2022, 09:09:36 AMLast edit: May 20, 2023, 03:12:06 PM by Welsh
comments.body: Quote from: Alfredbolk on December 06, 2022, 06:48:22 PMEasyCoins seem good to me. But before I create my account I would like to know more about your project. Where you based on? Are you registered company? Yes, We are a parent company in Singapore with Subsidiaries in US and Canada. Plus we have US and Canada MSB Licenses already. You can check http://easycoins.com/ for all detailsQuote from: ADAM Alams on December 07, 2022, 08:59:22 AMHow does 25% APY calculate? Is it fixed?Its a Fixed Income product where the upside is capped at 25% APY on a pro rata basis. We offer 35% downside protection on BTC and Ether, which means if the price of the underlying asset doesn't fall by more than 35%, you are guaranteed to make 25% APY returns. We are pioneer in Crypto Space for Structured Products. Structured Products in the conventional Financial industry sees an Investment of $1.5Tn every year. Normally these products require investment of $1MN Minimum. We are completely democratizing access to such advanced Structured products to Retail Investors.We were covered recently on Bloomberg as well. https://www.bloomberg.com/press-releases/2022-09-26/cryptocurrency-platform-easycoins-releases-snowball-a-new-wealth-management-investment-product [Moderator note: consecutive posts merged (separated via horizontal lines)]

comments.author: deivisr86
comments.body: What is the minimum deposit I can do ? Do you have despot bonus?

comments.author: Invincible one
comments.body: Quote from: deivisr86 on December 08, 2022, 01:55:46 PMWhat is the minimum deposit I can do ? Do you have despot bonus? You can start with $10 to start your Investment journey. But we recommend slightly higher amounts like $1000, so the earned revenue becomes more prominent.

comments.author: PSULLWALERS
comments.body: Is it 25% APY on a fixed deposit? If yes, how long do I need to hodl my bitcoin for?

comments.author: Invincible one
comments.body: Quote from: Abusadaoxes on December 09, 2022, 07:56:16 PMCan I buy bitcoin on your platform using my cards?We do offer 3rd party solutions like Onramper who can help you directly buy crypto with credit cards

comments.author: Invincible one
comments.created_time: December 12, 2022, 03:22:15 AMLast edit: May 20, 2023, 03:11:37 PM by Welsh
comments.body: Quote from: BTTlobverss on December 10, 2022, 08:57:54 PMQuote from: Invincible one on December 06, 2022, 02:16:03 PMEasyCoins is a Crypto Investment Platform for the masses making Crypto Investments Easy. Earn Up to 25% APY On Your HODLed BTC and Ether_______________________________________________________________________________ ___________________            WEBSITE | TWITTER  | FACEBOOK  | DISCORD  | TELEGRAM  |_______________________________________________________________________________ ___________________About EASYCOINS:Easycoins is a trusted crypto exchange that offers the most diverse and advanced investment products headquartered in India- To date, Easycoins has processed more than USD$1 billion in transactions with 100+ trading pairs, and is supported in over 200+ countries.Learn How To Get - 25% APY On Your HODLed Bitcoin.Learn More About Snowball - 30% APY_______________________________________________________________________________ ___________________1 Billion+Trading Volume_______________________________________________________________________________ ___________________200+ Supported Countries._______________________________________________________________________________ ___________________Learn How To Get - 25% APY On Your HODLed Bitcoin and Ether.            WEBSITE | TWITTER  | FACEBOOK  | DISCORD  | TELEGRAM  |Copyright © 2021-2022 EasyCoinsIt is not uncommon to find similar projects. What makes your project different from others?The difference is how we generate the yield. Most Yield products are Defi products and have significant inherent risks. We are offering Advanced Autocallable Options products which only the wealthiest in the world have access to. Minimum Investment size there is at least $100K USD.We are offering it at a very low entry amount of $100. Besides, none of the products offer 25% APY on BTC and Ether. They offer high yield on low value Altcoins no one has heard of. We are offering on the most reliable crypto assets like BTC and EtherQuote from: PSULLWALERS on December 11, 2022, 08:15:11 PMIs it 25% APY on a fixed deposit? If yes, how long do I need to hodl my bitcoin for?Its not like a Fixed deposit. It's like a subscription of a certain tenure based on specific rules. For 25% APY, the max duration you need to HODL is 6 months. However, based on our past experience, the product converts earlier automatically based on the 105% knock out feature and you get positive returns [Moderator note: consecutive posts merged (separated via horizontal lines)]
